greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of 2^(n-1)/n.
comment: n/2^(n-1) is the probability that when a stick is broken up at n-1 points independently and uniformly chosen at random along its length the n pieces cannot form an n-gon (D'Andrea and Gómez, 2006). - _Amiram Eldar_, Dec 04 2020
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..3322
Carlos D'Andrea and Emiliano Gómez, The Broken Spaghetti Noodle, The American Mathematical Monthly, Vol. 113, No. 6 (2006), pp. 555-557.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Trigonometry Angles.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Sphere Line Picking.
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Jun 01 2003
